comment._content: LEAGUE ISLAND MARINES OFF.; 1,300 Sail Early This Morning -- 8-Inch Shells Aboard. February 20, 1913, Thursday Page 2, 175 words (the article is available, but you have to scroll all the way down the page to see it). query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D0CEED7163FE633A...
